data.message: i put goggles on a turd and call it rae sremmurd because im more absurd than the word absurd incurs i want to put out a kidz bop and secretly sling more fuck words in one verse that can even be rehearsed i think i'd call it something trendy like cuff it can be something everybody can dance to. bitches don't get it  that around the age of twenty two i hadn't had a clue and lost a screw had to put the bitch back in with super glue so watch what what you do because i've been known to lose it like tom cruise. i don't give a fuck about a damn thing i'll hand you  a knife and let you blade check my fuckin hamstring lol
